title: New or Old? Which I-T regime should you choose for FY 2026-27? Tax rates, slabs explained
content: Union Budget 2026 maintains the existing income tax framework, with the new regime offering tax-free income up to Rs 12 lakh for individuals. While the old regime continues with its deductions, the new system has been progressively liberalized since 2020, making it increasingly attractive for middle-income taxpayers.

title: Defence, education, railways, income tax & more: 10 big announcements in Union Budget 2026
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2026-27, her ninth consecutive, with major announcements across defence, railways, income tax, and healthcare. Prime Minister Modi hailed it as "historic" and a "high flight toward Viksit Bharat." Key proposals include a significant defence allocation, seven high-speed rail corridors, a simplified Income Tax Act, and support for rare-earth mineral development.

title: Why Nifty50, BSE Sensex crashed after Budget 2026 speech? Top reasons
content: Stock market crash after Budget 2026: Investors reacted negatively to a hike in Securities Transaction Tax (STT) on futures and options (F&O) trades announced by FM Sitharaman.

title: IMF data puts India ahead of US in 2026 global real GDP growth; Elon Musk responds
content: India is set to lead global economic growth by 2026, surpassing the US, according to IMF data. Elon Musk highlighted this seismic shift, noting India and China will drive over 43% of worldwide expansion. This surge, fueled by domestic strength and manufacturing, signals a changing global economic landscape beyond traditional Western markets.

title: 'Blind to India’s real crises': How Rahul Gandhi, oppn leaders reacted to the Union Budget
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2026-27, increasing capital expenditure to Rs 12.2 lakh crore. The Rs 53.5 lakh crore budget received mixed reactions, with the BJP hailing it as growth-oriented, while the Congress termed it "disappointing" and lacking specifics for common citizens.

title: STT hike after Budget 2026: What does it mean for F&O traders and investors
content: Starting April 1, 2026, India will see increased Securities Transaction Tax (STT) on futures and options trading. The Finance Minister announced higher rates for options premium, exercise, and futures, aiming to moderate speculative activity. This change, part of Budget 2026, will slightly raise trading costs for derivatives participants, while equity and mutual fund STT rates remain untouched.

title: Budget 2026: Rare earths & Orange Economy - key takeaways and what they mean
content: Union Budget 2026-27 prioritizes infrastructure growth and manufacturing, with a significant capital expenditure increase to ₹12.2 lakh crore. Fiscal deficit targets 4.3% of GDP. Key initiatives include a new Income Tax Act, the Biopharma Shakti scheme, and support for semiconductor and rare earth production, aiming to boost economic momentum and self-reliance.

title: 'High flight toward Viksit Bharat': PM Modi hails Union Budget 2026 as 'historic'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi hailed the Union Budget 2026 as "historic," charting a roadmap for a Viksit Bharat by 2047 and boosting India's reform journey. He also highlighted the "mother of all deals" with the EU, aimed at benefiting youth and MSMEs, and praised Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's record ninth consecutive budget presentation.

title: Google cofounder makes biggest-ever public donation to tackle California housing crisis
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has made his largest public donation, contributing $20 million to a new coalition tackling California's housing crisis. This significant move, backed by other tech leaders, comes as the state's wealthy face a potential wealth tax. Brin's philanthropy has been substantial, with billions donated to various causes, including climate solutions and medical research.

title: What Budget 2026-27 means for Indian IT industry: 8 Biggest announcements
content: Union Budget 2026-27 unveils significant tech sector boosts, including a 20-year tax holiday for foreign cloud service providers operating from India. Key initiatives like India Semiconductor Mission 2.0 and increased outlay for Electronics Components Manufacturing Scheme aim to fortify domestic capabilities and attract global investment.

title: Budget 2026 income tax: Top announcements made by FM Sitharaman - check list
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled the Union Budget 2026. New rules simplify tax filing and reduce burdens. Key changes include extended deadlines for revised returns and staggered filing dates. Tax Collected at Source rates for education, medical purposes, and overseas tours are reduced. Small taxpayers get easier tax deductions. Awards from the Motor Accident Claims Tribunal are now tax-exempt.

title: Nvidia H-1B data reveals US pay as Jensen Huang reviews all compensation
content: Nvidia's soaring stock has created millionaires among its employees, with H-1B visa filings revealing substantial base salaries for critical roles. While CEO Jensen Huang emphasizes personal involvement in compensation, earlier hires have significantly benefited from equity appreciation. The data offers a glimpse into the pay for engineers, architects, researchers, and product managers, excluding bonuses and equity.

title: SHE gets a boost in Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget 2026
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the 'SHE Marts' initiative to empower women entrepreneurs, building on the Lakhpati Didi scheme. These community-owned retail outlets will strengthen grassroots entrepreneurship by enabling women-led self-help groups to operate local retail networks, improving market access for their products and creating sustainable livelihoods.

title: Op Sindoor impact: Defence budget jumps to Rs 7.85 lakh cr, modernisation gets Rs 2.19 lakh cr
content: The Union Budget 2026 significantly boosts defence spending to Rs 7.85 lakh crore, a substantial rise from last year.  Modernisation efforts will receive Rs 2.19 lakh crore, with key allocations for aircraft and naval fleets.  Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman also announced customs duty exemptions on aircraft components and raw materials, aiming to invigorate the defence aerospace industry.

title: Handshake refused! India vs Pakistan U19 World Cup showdown opens with tense moment
content: India and Pakistan U-19 captains notably skipped the customary handshake at the toss for their crucial World Cup encounter. This follows a recent trend of no handshakes between the two nations' cricket teams amid ongoing political tensions. The match is a must-win for Pakistan to keep their semi-final hopes alive.

title: From arithmetic to architecture: What Budget 2026 really means
content: The most consequential decision is also the quietest. The Centre has accepted the Commission’s recommendation to retain 41% vertical devolution to states. In an era where political economy is increasingly centralised in rhetoric if not always in law, this is a signal worth underlining. It anchors federal trust even as the Centre tightens its own fiscal belt. The Budget’s fiscal deficit for 2026–27 is pegged at 4.3% of GDP, with a clear glide path towards a 50±1% debt-to-GDP ratio by 2030. This is not austerity. It is choreography.

title: Wedding Rumors: Viral video claims Rashmika, Vijay to wed in Udaipur on February 2
content: Speculation is rife as a vlogger shared footage from a lavish venue in Udaipur, claiming it's the wedding site for Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda, with the ceremony reportedly set for February 2. While the couple has never confirmed their relationship, past rumors of an engagement and a February 26 wedding in Udaipur have also surfaced.

title: Education Budget 2026: Sitharaman announces five university townships to boost learning, research and jobs
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, presenting the Union Budget 2026–27, announced the creation of five university townships near major industrial and logistic corridors. These zones will house universities, colleges, research institutions, skill centres, and residential complexes, aiming to integrate education, skills, and employment. The Budget also includes girls’ hostels in every district to improve access and participation in higher education.

title: How Budget 2026 has given India firepower to counter Trump’s tariffs
content: India's Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled the Union Budget 2026. Measures aim to support key export sectors facing US tariffs. The budget includes customs duty reductions and manufacturing incentives. These steps are designed to boost export competitiveness and resilience against global economic shifts. Capital expenditure sees an increase, while the fiscal deficit is projected to narrow.

title: The entertainment industry expects cheaper tax slabs for movie tickets
content: As the weekend approaches, cinema lovers and industry insiders are abuzz with anticipation for Sunday’s budget meeting. There's a hopeful sentiment in the air, as many are looking for further relief on ticket prices. Although GST 2.0 brought some much-needed reductions, the soaring ticket costs still linger under older tax categories.

title: 'Pakistan deflecting attention': India rejects 'baseless' claims on Balochistan attacks
content: India has categorically rejected Pakistan's "baseless" allegations of Indian backing for recent deadly attacks in Balochistan. The Ministry of External Affairs stated Pakistan should address the region's long-standing demands and its "record of suppression, brutality and violation of human rights" instead of deflecting blame.

title: Change in income tax slabs after Budget 2026? Check for new, old regime
content: Latest Income Slabs FY 2026-2027 after Budget 2026: Taxpayers will continue to pay income tax as per the ongoing income tax slabs that are currency effective for FY 2025-2026. The income tax slabs under the new income tax regime underwent a major overhaul in last year’s Budget and hence this year the expectation was low of the FM bringing any changes.

title: Union Budget 2026: Full text of Nirmala Sitharaman's speech; download PDF
content: Presenting the 2026-27 Budget, the Finance Minister outlined a vision for Viksit Bharat, emphasizing sustained growth, structural reforms, and citizen empowerment. Key proposals include scaling up manufacturing in strategic sectors, rejuvenating legacy industries, supporting MSMEs, and a significant push for infrastructure development.

title: FM brings IT services under single category in Union Budget: What this means for IT companies
content: Union Budget 2026 designates 'Information Technology Services' as a single category for IT companies, including software development, IT-enabled services, KPOs, and contract R&D. A uniform 15.5 per cent safe harbour margin will apply, with increased thresholds and automated approvals. A fast-track Unilateral APA process for IT services aims for conclusion within two years.

title: Union Budget 2026: Big push to ‘future ready’ infra, FM raises capex target to 12.2 lakh crore
content: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a nearly 9 per cent increase in capital expenditure to Rs 12.2 lakh crore for FY 2026-27, prioritizing infrastructure-led growth. The budget also introduces a risk guarantee fund to boost private participation and outlines initiatives for transport, logistics, and manufacturing to support future economic expansion.

title: Budget 2026: What is a tax holiday? What Nirmala Sitharaman announced in her Budget speech
content: Foreign companies offering global cloud services via Indian data centres will enjoy a tax holiday until 2047, a significant boost for digital infrastructure.  This move aims to attract investment and strengthen India's position in cloud computing and AI.  Software development and IT services are now unified under a single category, with a common safe harbour margin of 15.5 per cent.

title: Budget Highlights: No change in tax slabs, high-speed rail and rare earth corridors
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2026-27, announcing a Rs 12.2 lakh crore capex target and a fiscal deficit of 4.3%. Key highlights include no changes to income tax slabs, relief for accident compensation recipients, and reduced TCS on overseas tour packages. The new Income Tax Act, 2025, takes effect April 1.

title: Budget 2026: FM Sitharaman announces Khelo India mission to develop coaches, training centres
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced a new Khelo India mission to transform India's sports sector over the next decade. This initiative will focus on an integrated talent development framework, including training centers, coach development, sports science integration, and infrastructure enhancement. The mission aims to nurture grassroots talent and bolster India's global sporting ambitions.

title: Budget 2026: A look at Nirmala Sitharaman’s longest and shortest Budget speeches
content: Nirmala Sitharaman delivered her ninth consecutive Union Budget speech, lasting 1 hour and 25 minutes, outlining the fiscal roadmap for 2026-27. This presentation marks her record-breaking six years and eight months as Finance Minister in continuous office. Prime Minister Modi hailed the event as a proud parliamentary tradition.

title: Union Budget 2026: Govt waives customs duty on cancer drugs—key health sector updates
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented her ninth consecutive Union Budget—becoming the first finance minister in India to achieve this milestone—and also the first to present a Union Budget on a Sunday. The Economic Survey tabled ahead of the Budget had projected India’s economic growth at 6.8–7.2 per cent in FY27, providing the broader macroeconomic context for social sector spending.

title: Returned from studying abroad? Union Budget 2026 tax clause students shouldn’t ignore
content: Returned home after studying abroad? Union Budget 2026 introduces a one-time, six-month foreign asset disclosure scheme that lets you voluntarily report undisclosed overseas income or foreign bank accounts (within ₹1 crore/₹5 crore limits) without penalties or prosecution. For Indian students with foreign internships, stipends, overseas pay, ESOPs or global accounts, this is a rare compliance reset before tax residency reignites scrutiny.

title: Budget 2026: Odisha, Kerala, Andhra, Tamil Nadu to get dedicated rare earth corridors — what it means
content: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman has proposed dedicated rare earth corridors in Odisha, Andhra Pradesh, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala to boost domestic capabilities and reduce import dependence. The initiative, part of the 2026-27 Union Budget, aims to support mining, processing, and manufacturing of critical minerals essential for clean energy and defence.

title: Railway Budget 2026: 7 high-speed rail corridors announced - check routes & other details
content: Railway Budget 2026 Live: "In order to promote environmentally sustainable passenger systems, we will develop seven high speed rail corridors between cities as growth collectors," FM Sitharaman announced.

title: Union Budget: Law Ministry's e-Courts project gets ₹1,200 crore
content: According to the budget document, the project has received ₹1,200 crore as against ₹1,500 crore in the budget estimate

title: Elderly woman alleges theft of gold, diamonds from baggage during trip from Bengaluru to US
content: The woman’s checked-in baggage allegedly contained approximately 790 grams of gold jewellery, diamond ornaments worth about ₹8 lakh, medicines valued at ₹20,000, and USD 200 in cash.

title: PM Modi renames Adampur airport after Guru Ravidas, inaugurates Halwara airport civil terminal in Punjab
content: The prime minister would also be visiting Dera Sachkhand Ballan on the occasion of the 649th birth anniversary of Guru Ravidas

title: Union Budget 2026: Defence Budget pegged at ₹7.85 lakh crore; 15% increase over current fiscal
content: The increase in the defence outlay against the backdrop of "historic success of Operation Sindoor" has further strengthened our resolve to make India's defence system even more robust, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh said

title: Heritage in peril: Damage to Bidar’s karez water system after unauthorised alteration raises alarm
content: The Naubad–Aliyabad karez, believed to have been built in the 15th century by the Bahmani Sultanate, is an ancient underground water-harvesting system. Conservationists point out that the system holds strong potential for nomination as a UNESCO World Heritage site if conserved scientifically.

title: A Budget for health, capability, and global responsibility
content: The Union Budget 2026 underscores a commitment to building strong institutions, nurturing human capital, and creating systems that serve both present and future generations

title: India trashes Pakistan's allegations of Indian hand in disturbing peace in Balochistan
content: External Affairs Ministry spokesperson Randhir Jaiswal also highlighted Pakistan's record of suppression, brutality and violation of human rights

title: Tirupati laddu row: TTD EO transferred, Special CS Ravichandra appointed in-charge EO
content: Mr. Singhal was at the helm of affairs in the TTD when the ghee was suspected to be adulterated during the YSR Congress Party regime

title: Union Budget turns election spotlight on West Bengal with freight corridors, industry push
content: In recent years, Union Budgets preceding Assembly elections have often carried pronounced regional emphasis

title: Budget 2026: ₹4,551 crore for I-B Ministry; funds for Prasar Bharati, to support radio movement
content: The scheme implemented through Prasar Bharati aims at digitalisation and FMisation of the AIR Network, upgradation of the capacity of the DTH platform to accommodate more channels and enriching viewers' experience

title: Union Budget 2026: KCCI flags absence of dedicated Coastal Economic Corridor for West Coast
content: The exclusion of coastal Karnataka from the proposed high-speed rail growth corridors limits connectivity-led development, the Chamber said.

title: Nothing concrete on affordable housing in Union Budget 2026: Realtors’ apex body CREDAI
content: The association, however, welcomed the government's focus on creation of infrastructure, which would benefit the Indian property sector

title: Union Budget 2026-27: ‘Seems to have missed the ball’, Shashi Tharoor slams with cricketing analogy
content: Shashi Tharoor asserted that the biggest unanswered question remains jobs, noting that there was little in the Budget speech to indicate how employment would be generated

title: Nothing for the common man, Bengal in ‘directionless’ Budget: Mamata
content: TMC national general secretary Abhishek Banerjee accused the Centre of seeing people of West Bengal as "Bangladeshis", as he lambasted the Finance Minister for not mentioning the State in her Budget speech

title: Budget 2026: The 14 States mentioned by Finance Minister and a breakdown of related projects
content: While 14 States received direct mentions, the Budget’s footprint expands to 24 States and territories through strategic projects in rail, heritage, and industrial corridors

title: Andhra Pradesh’s Budget boost – rare earth corridor, high-speed rail
content: The Ministry of Mines found significant reserves of rare earth elements in Andhra, and in 2024, some blocks were given to the State government for auction for exploration

title: Budget 2026 reflects clarity of thought, compassion, conviction: Andhra Health Minister Satya Kumar Yadav
content: Andhra Pradesh Health Minister Satya Kumar Yadav said the Budget is the best possible under the present global political turbulence and economic challenges

title: Union Budget 2026-27 is growth-oriented, says CII-Southern Region deputy chairman
content: There has been a focus on infrastructure for the past three to four years and some of the announcements made in the Union Budget, such as the high-speed railway corridor, freight corridor, and waterways, among others, would boost connectivity, P. Ravichandran said

title: Fear of free-roaming elephants keeps children away from this anganwadi in Sringeri taluk
content: An Anganwadi centre at Bhalekadi in Sringeri taluk has a teacher and a worker, but only one child attending it

title: Union Budget 2026 lacks policy vision, offers no solutions, says Mallikarjun Kharge
content: Rahul Gandhi said the Union Budget for 2026-27 is “blind to India’s real crises”, and highlighted how the youth are without jobs, manufacturing is falling and farmers are in distress

title: Budget 2026: Government proposes integrated programme to boost textile sector
content: A National Handloom and Handicraft programme has been proposed to integrate and strengthen existing schemes and ensure targeted support for weavers and artisans

title: 'Historic' Budget reflects aspirations of 140 crore Indians: PM Modi
content: PM Modi said this year's budget presents an ambitious roadmap to give new momentum to the 'Make in India' and 'Aatmanirbhar Bharat' initiatives

title: Union Budget 2026 lowers fiscal deficit target for FY27 to 4.3%; pace of consolidation slows
content: According to experts, the moderation in the pace of fiscal consolidation is primarily due to a fall in the Centre’s gross tax to GDP ratio

title: Tiger crosses river Godavari, returns to human habitations from Papikonda National Park
content: The same tiger was last sighted entering into Papikonda National Park via Eluru district on January 29

title: Union Budget 2026: Will bolster India’s global image as attractive investment destination, says Amit Shah
content: The Union Home Minister said the Budget reflects the vision of a developed India by 2047 and the roadmap for the next 25 years

title: Three college students killed, three others injured as car collides with bus at Ezhuthur
content: As the car approached Ezhuthur, the driver lost control of the wheel, and the vehicle jumped the median and landed on the opposite lane

title: FM Sitharaman proposes 'East Coast Industrial Corridor', 5 tourism destinations in 'Purvodaya' States in Union Budget
content: Nirmala Sitharaman proposed to launch a scheme for the development of Buddhist circuits in six northeastern States

title: Dedicated rare earth corridors in TN, Kerala, would promote mining: CII
content: The Union Budget 2026 proposal towards establishment of Rare Earth Corridors would help promote mining, processing, research and manufacturing and thus help build India's leadership in rare earth magnets

title: Kerala for All conclave: Kerala urged to build world-class accessibility model in tourism
content: Suman Billa, Additional Secretary and Director General, Ministry of Tourism, Government of India, stresses the need to think about accessibility beyond hard infrastructure and to incorporate assistive technologies powered by artificial intelligence

title: ₹1 crore ex-gratia to young Constable Sowmya’s family; Telangana CM orders stringent against those responsible for her death
content: Excise Minister Jupally Krishna Rao also announced a Government job to Somwya’s brother and the constable’s salary payment till her scheduled retirement

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Finance Minister Sitharaman proposes incentives of ₹100 crore for single bond issuance by municipal corporations
content: The Finance Minister also announced restructuring of REC Limited and PFC as part of the government's public sector financial institution strengthening

title: Finance Minister announces 5 university townships near major industrial logistic hubs in Union Budget
content: Nirmala Sitharaman also announced the setting up of one girls' hostel in every district of the country

title: Budget 2026: One-time measure proposed to facilitate sales from SEZs to domestic market at concessional duty
content: Ms. Sitharaman said that necessary regulatory changes will be undertaken to operationalise these measures while ensuring level-playing field for the units working in the DTA

title: Bengaluru woman murdered, domestic help found dead at home in Mico Layout
content: Though the incident occurred around midnight, the matter came to light at around 4.30 a.m. when the victim’s husband, who had returned from Dubai on February 1, reached the house to find her dead.

title: Union Budget: Five regional medical hubs to be set up to boost medical tourism in country
content: Finance Minister Sitharaman also announced setting up of three new All India Institutes of Ayurveda to strengthen research in the field

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Sitharaman extends tax exemption on capital goods used to make lithium-ion cells for battery storage
content: In her Budget speech, she also proposed to exclude the entire value of biogas while calculating excise duty levy on (biogas) blended CNG (compressed natural gas)

title: Nandyal MP Shabari condemns Ambati Rambabu’s remarks against Andhra CM Chandrababu Naidu
content: Nandyal MP Byreddy Shabari said it has become a habit for the YSRCP leaders to make humiliating and disparaging remarks against the ruling party leaders

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Totally lacklustre, says Congress
content: "The speech was also non-transparent since it gave no idea whatsoever of budgetary allocations for key programmes and schemes," Jairam Ramesh said

title: Budget 2026: Government to provide tax holiday for foreign companies offering cloud services using India data centres
content: To avail the tax holiday, companies need to provide services to Indian customers through an Indian reseller entity

title: Kerala for All conclave: Accessible tourism no longer a niche segment but mainstream imperative, says Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan
content: Speaking after inaugurating Kerala for All conclave organised by Kerala Tourism and The Hindu Group in Kochi, Pinarayi Vijayan says Kerala is committed to setting a model for the country by learning from the global best practices while adapting them to local realities of State

title: Union Budget 2026-27 | Three of seven high-speed rail corridors to connect Hyderabad
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, during presentation of the Budget, said that the corridors will be developed to promote environmentally sustainable passenger systems

title: Thai Poosam festival: Devotees get a glimpse of ‘Jyothi Darshan’ at Vadalur
content: Devotees from Tamil Nadu and neighbouring Puducherry thronged the Sathya Gnana Sabha to catch a glimpse of the holy light placed in the sanctum sanctorum

title: Union Budget 2026: India set to host first ever Global Big Cat summit
content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said the International Big Cat Alliance (IBCA) was set up last year

title: Union Budget rolls out roadmap to digitise heritage and open up archaeological sites
content: Finance Minister announced National Destination Digital Knowledge Grid to document all places of significance

title: Union Budget 2026: Government to tax buybacks as capital gains, says FM Nirmala Sitharaman
content: The Finance Minister said to incentivize misuse of tax arbitrage, the promoters will pay an additional buyback tax

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announces ₹20,000-crore carbon capture, utilisation scheme
content: The Union Finance Minister said the government will provide incentives for manufacturing seaplanes in the country as part of efforts to boost tourism

title: Budget 2026: FM Nirmala Sitharaman announces 6-month foreign asset disclosure scheme for small taxpayers
content: FM Nirmala Sitharaman said there will be no interest liability on taxpayers on the penalty amount for the period of appeal before first appellate authority, irrespective of outcome

title: Union Budget 2026 political reactions LIVE: Tamil Nadu's interests were fully ignored in the Budget, says Stalin
content: PM Modi described the Union Budget as "historic", saying it reflected the aspirations of 140 crore Indians

title: Union Budget 2026: Mountain, turtle, birdwatching trails to come up in Himachal, Jammu & Kashmir, Odisha, Karnataka, Kerala, Tamil Nadu
content: Three birdwatching trails along the Pulicat Lake in Andhra Pradesh-Tamil Nadu border will be developed

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Sitharaman calls to reduce tax collected on source for pursuing education, medical purposes under to 2%
content: Ms. Sitharaman also called to reduce the TCS on overseas tour programme packages to 2% without any stipulations for amount

title: Watch: Sunetra Pawar: From social work to Maharashtra Deputy CM
content: Sunetra Pawar, former Rajya Sabha MP and social activist from Baramati, has been named Maharashtra’s Deputy Chief Minister following Ajit Pawar’s death. Her rise reflects both her family’s political legacy and her growing influence within the NCP and Maharashtra politics.

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Government to develop 'corporate mitras' cadre to help MSMEs
content: The cadre of "corporate mitras" will help Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) to meet their compliance requirements at affordable costs

title: Kerala for All conclave: Kerala is a fort against religious polarisation, says N. Ram
content: In his keynote address during the inauguration of ‘Kerala for All’ conclave, N. Ram says inclusive and accessible tourism should be treated as a right of all tourists and not something that is given as charity or as a special privilege

title: Union Budget 2026: Sitharaman calls for restructuring of Power Finance Corp, Rural Electrification Corp
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman underlined this would help achieve scale and improve efficiencies

title: Budget 2026: Odisha, T.N., Andhra, Kerala to get dedicated rare earth corridors to promote research and mining
content: The move comes as India looks to reduce its dependence on China for rare-earth minerals. Two of the four states, Tamil Nadu and Kerala, are set to go to Assembly elections in 2026

title: Navjot Kaur Sidhu quits Congress, takes dig at Punjab party chief
content: She criticised Punjab Congress president Amarinder Singh Raja Warring, blaming him for “damaging the organisation” and blamed him of “selling the party for petty gains with an understanding with AAP”

title: Union Budget 2026: Sitharaman proposes ₹10,000 crore investment in biopharma over next 5 years
content: Budget 2026: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman also proposed interventions in six areas, including manufacturing, strategic and frontier sectors, healthcare and advanced technology

title: Union Budget 2026: Twenty new National Waterways to be operationalised over five years, FM Sitharaman announces
content: A coastal cargo scheme was also announced in order to increase the share of coastal shipping and inland waterways

title: Union Budget 2026 announces seven high-speed rail corridors
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman said it would develop environmentally sustainable passenger system

title: PM Modi reiterates India’s continued support for Palestinians
content: Foreign Ministers of Arab countries called on PM Narendra Modi, who appreciated their role in supporting peace and stability in West Asia.

title: Economic Offences Wing Kashmir chargesheets two in fake international prize scam
content: The man who got scammed was asked to deposit money into different accounts to win a prize of ₹2.35 crore along with a car

title: Congress takes dig at govt after Trump's 'India to buy Venezuelan oil' remark'
content: President Donald Trump continues to give us information on what our own government has done or will be doing, Mr. Ramesh said

title: Kerala for All conclave Day 2 LIVE: Accessible tourism is no longer a niche segment, but a mainstream imperative, says CM
content: Day Two brings policymakers, administrators, practitioners and industry leaders together to outline pathways to embed inclusive thinking into the future of Kerala’s tourism landscape

title: India’s only Chinatown in Kolkata, fading away
content: The Chinese community in Kolkata now has only about 2,000 people, down from about 50,000 in the 1960s. In the SIR process in West Bengal 389 of 484 voters have been categorised as untraceable or absent. For a community that began coming to the city since the 1840s, and has dealt with racism in many forms, the dwindling numbers in the SIR are a reflection of many leaving the country, reports Shrabana Chatterjee

title: Union Budget 2026-27: Centre must fulfil promises to Kerala, including AIIMS, says Shashi Tharoor
content: The Congress MP also said unemployment was another major concern facing the country and hoped the budget would include measures to tackle it.

title: Expect Union Budget to give fresh momentum to Delhi’s development, says Delhi CM
content: CM Rekha Gupta noted that the Central government is actively involved in several important projects in the city, including cleaning of the Yamuna and the construction of sewage treatment plants

title: Union Budget 2026 LIVE: Inflation is down in India and it is remaining there for some time, says Finance Minister at post-Budget presser
content: Govt to provide tax holiday for foreign cos offering cloud services using India data centres; FM proposes to exempt minimum alternate tax for non-residents paying tax on presumptive basis

title: Firing outside film maker Rohit Shetty’s Mumbai residence, probe underway
content: The police were examining CCTV footage from around the building to identify the accused and establish the sequence of events

title: If firm profits more from its scale, it has to bear more responsibility for environmental costs: Supreme Court
content: Observing that bigger operations signify a bigger footprint, the top court said a larger scale often means more resource use, more emissions and more waste, leading to more environmental stress

title: Murals based on Tamil culture beneath Madhya Kailash flyover to add to art on OMR
content: Sources in the Highways Department said that the murals were chosen from the arts - literature, music, and theatre reflecting Tamil culture

title: Part of Rajiv Gandhi Salai shut over sewer line repairs
content: A former Highways engineer said that this was the fourth time that sinking had occured at various locations on Rajiv Gandhi Salai due to the same sewer line

title: Sonam Wangchuk taken to AIIMS Jodhpur
content: The Supreme Court directs jail authorities to arrange specialist treatment after his counsel flags persistent stomach pain due to the water quality in jail

title: Indian Coast Guard gears up for 50th Raising Day ceremony
content: Aligned with the vision of ‘Aatmanirbhar Bharat’ and ‘Make in India’, the ICG is steadily moving towards self-reliance through the induction of indigenously-built ships, aircraft, helicopters, and advanced surveillance systems, while simultaneously prioritising infrastructure development and personnel welfare, the ICG said in a statement

title: In place of BNSS, CrPC is still being used in Jharkhand, says former Congress MLA Amba Prasad
content: She pointed out that a ‘dead law’ is still being used in official government documents throughout the state, and ironically, everyone, from the administration to the opposition, is silent.

title: Why is the India-EU trade agreement significant? | Explained
content: How much of the trade value of what India exports to the European Union region will the EU’s tariff concessions cover? Which are the sectors besides textiles, apparel, manufactured goods and Indian traditional medicine services that the free trade agreement will help?

title: Why have the new UGC regulations been stayed? | Explained

title: Budget 2026 gives a boost to mental healthcare: North India to get its own NIMHANS
content:
NEW DELHI: Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced the plans to set up a new unit for the National Institute for Mental Health and Neuro Sciences in North India. Acknowledging the lack of mental health institutions in the region, she also announced the national mental health institutes in Jharkhand's Ranchi and Assam's Tezpur shall also be upgraded. Addressing the gaps in the mental health infrastructure in India, Sitharaman introduced the upgrade, stating, "Reaffirming our commitment to mental health and trauma care, there are no national institutes for mental health care in North India."

Mental Health Takes Priority In Budget 2026, FM Sitharaman Announces NIMHANS 2 For North India

She further announced the government's plan to establish and upgrade mental health institutions in North India. She said, "We will therefore set up a NIMHANS 2.0 and also upgrade national mental health institutes in Ranchi and Tezpur as regional apex institutions."

title: Teofimo Lopez Jr.-Shakur Stevenson live updates, r...
content: Shakur Stevenson  became a four-division champion after defeating   Teofimo Lopez Jr.  by unanimous decision Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York. Stevenson, who moved up in weight to challenge Lopez and make his debut at junior welterweight, won by scorecards of 119-109, 119-109 and 119-109. Stevenson (25-0, 11 KOs) is now a world champion in a fourth division after previous titles at featherweight, junior lightweight and lightweight. He was coming off  a dominant victory over William Zepeda  in July. Lopez (22-2, 13 KOs) had won six straight fights since  his upset loss to George Kambosos Jr.  in 2021. A former unified lightweight champion, Lopez was making his fourth defense of the 140-pound belt he captured with a  unanimous decision win over Josh Taylor  in June 2023. Lopez also owns notable victories  over Vasiliy Lomachenko  in 2020 and  Arnold Barboza Jr. last May . Relive all the action, undercard results and round-by-round analysis from Andreas Hale.
